special_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create Goggles, a legendary 3/3 green Elemental Dragon creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
[+1]: Whenever a creature you control attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
[-2]: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
[-3]: Draw a card for each creature you controlled that dealt damage to a player this turn.
